function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The decrease in demand for physical commercial service facilities in the community life circle may lead to economic impact.","Impact":"Decrease in economic activity and local business revenue.","Mitigation":"Develop strategies to attract customers back to physical commercial service facilities, such as offering incentives and promotions.","Technologies":"Online marketing and advertising platforms to reach potential customers.","People":"Local business owners, community members.","Owner":"Local business owners, community organizations."},{"Description":"Increased reliance on non-contact transportation services may impact the use of public transport facilities and lead to overcrowding in alternative transportation modes.","Impact":"Overcrowding, congestion, and potential health risks in non-contact transportation services.","Mitigation":"Implement measures to manage and regulate the use of non-contact transportation services, such as limiting the number of shared bikes at popular locations.","Technologies":"Smart city mobility and transportation management systems to track and optimize non-contact transportation services.","People":"Transportation service providers, local government, residents.","Owner":"Local government, transportation service providers."},{"Description":"The spatial configuration requirements for new facilities in the community life circles may lead to increased construction activity and potential disruption to existing infrastructure.","Impact":"Disruption to local communities, noise pollution, and environmental impact from construction activities.","Mitigation":"Plan and coordinate construction activities to minimize disruption, and implement environmental impact assessments for new facility construction.","Technologies":"Construction management software for efficient scheduling and coordination of construction activities.","People":"Local residents, environmental advocacy groups, construction workers.","Owner":"Construction companies, local government, environmental regulators."}]}
